properties.errorDuplicateMsg: Este número de Processo já existe.

properties.value:
<script type="text/javascript">
    $(document).change(function(){
        var nomeBancoId = "nome_banco";
        var nWFBancoId = "n_wf_banco";
        var nWFPlId = "n_wf_pl";
  
        //get values
 
        var nomeBanco = $('[name='+nomeBancoId+']:enabled').val();
        var nWFBanco = $('[name='+nWFBancoId+']:enabled').val();
         
        //function to compare
 
        n_wf_pl = nomeBanco + "DPA" + nWFBanco;
          
        //store the value to a field
        $('[name='+nWFPlId+']:enabled').val(n_wf_pl);
    });
</script>
